<h3 id="X38111">X(38111) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(5), X(7)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*(b+c)*a^5-(5*b^2-8*b*c+5*c^2)*a^4-6*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+2*(4*b^2+b*c+4*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38111) = X(5)-4*X(142) = X(5)+2*X(31657) = 3*X(5)-2*X(38139) = X(7)+2*X(140) = 2*X(9)-5*X(632) = 2*X(142)+X(31657) = 6*X(142)-X(38139) = X(21151)-3*X(38065) = 5*X(21151)+3*X(38073) = 2*X(21151)+3*X(38080) = 2*X(21151)+X(38137) = 3*X(31657)+X(38139) = 5*X(38065)+X(38073) = 2*X(38065)+X(38080) = 3*X(38065)+X(38107) = 6*X(38065)+X(38137) = 2*X(38073)-5*X(38080) = 3*X(38073)-5*X(38107) = 6*X(38073)-5*X(38137) = X(38139)-3*X(38171)</b>
<p>X(38111) lies on these lines: {2,5843}, {5,142}, {7,140}, {9,632}, {30,21151}, {144,3526}, {511,38164}, {515,38172}, {516,8703}, {517,38041}, {518,38112}, {527,11539}, {547,5817}, {548,31671}, {549,5762}, {550,5805}, {952,38030}, {1483,2550}, {1484,10427}, {1656,36996}, {3525,20059}, {3530,5759}, {3564,38115}, {3627,5732}, {3628,5779}, {3845,38150}, {3850,36991}, {3858,31672}, {5054,21168}, {5249,37364}, {5542,5690}, {5763,33575}, {5840,38173}, {5844,11038}, {5845,38110}, {5850,11231}, {5851,34126}, {5852,38114}, {5886,24644}, {6172,10124}, {6883,30275}, {8727,27186}, {10283,38053}, {13373,15587}, {14869,31658}, {15699,38093}, {16239,18230}, {17768,31650}, {25557,34352}, {28160,38151}, {28174,38036}, {28204,38094}, {28224,38149}, {32613,33558}, {38042,38204}</p>
<p>
X(38111) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {6173, 38122}, {11038, 38121}, {21151, 38107}, {31657, 38171}, {38030, 38052}, {38054, 38123}<br>
X(38111) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 38171), (549, 38122), (3845, 38150), (5817, 547), (10283, 38053), (15699, 38093), (38041, 38054), (38042, 38204), (38137, 38107), (38170, 38052), (38171, 142)<br>
X(38111) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (142, 31657, 5), (38065, 38107, 21151), (38080, 38137, 38107), (38124, 38125, 38030)<br>
</p>
